rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 10 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 12:10 AM, 29 June 2025(Sunday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Quezon, Cavite, Laguna, Batangas, Nueva Ecija and Bulacan within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Metro Manila(Makati, Pasay, Pasig, Pateros), Rizal(Antipolo, Taytay, Cainta) and Bataan(Morong) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
